name: Bug World
description:
A Better Experience: Windows build is HIGHLY Recommended!

A Platzi's Game of Truth Entry. Mixup: A Rhythmical Roguelike.

Such a vivid dream, the music seems to merge with the surroundings! Can you come to the end of the dream? or you will lose yourself in a sweet reality...

Credits: 

Audio & Programming: Henry Mata @hbmh

Art & Design: Paolo Sivila @DallOner

Controls:

Keyboard: Arrows to move!

Gamepad: L-Stick (desire direction) + Button [A] to move.
